<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lion's Shield](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2823)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 234 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 245 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Shield** [Steel Shield](/Shields.aspx?ID=19)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This steel shield (Hardness 6, HP 36, BT 18) is forged into the shape of a roaring lion's head. The lion's head functions as _+1 striking_ [shield boss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=41) that can't be removed from the shield. 

**Activate—Lion's Bite** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** Your Shield is raised; **Effect** You animate the lion's head, making a melee Strike with it. The shield's biting maw is a martial melee weapon that deals 2d6 piercing damage and has the [deadly](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) d6 trait; it can't be enhanced by runes. The shield remains animated for 1 minute, during which time you can Strike with it each time you [Raise the Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98), as well as with a Strike action.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
